metadata.title: USN-4618-1 -- tmux vulnerability
metadata.description: Sergey Nizovtsev discovered that tmux incorrectly handled some inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4618-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tmux - 3.0a-2ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
